issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

fields.summary: Can kill other user's applications via RM UI

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

fields.summary: Add a "kill application" button to Resource Manager's Web UI

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

issuetype.description: An improvement or enhancement to an existing feature or task.
issuetype.name: Improvement

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

fields.description: Configuring SPNEGO for web browser could be a head ache, so many production cluster choose to configure a unsecured UI access even for a secured cluster. In this setup, users (login as some random guy) could watch other users job which is expected. However, the kill button (added in YARN-3249 which enabled by default) shouldn't work in this situation.
fields.summary: If UI is not secured, we allow user to kill other users' job even yarn cluster is secured.
